location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Aboo [Ä€bu] to Colonel John Allen Wright

mods.abstract: Letter regarding the lack of news of Colonel Nixon's return and that any orders the Colonel is given in Bombay would have to conform with the recent rule changes laid down by Government and that any change in Allen's position at Oodeypore [Udaipur] would be issued by Government in conformity with the said new rules.
